import Switch1 from "../../../comman/Switch"; */import{getPath}from"../../../../actions/URLs";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default class Icons extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={icons:[{image:"/asset/play_icon.gif"},{image:"/asset/play_icon2.gif"},{image:"/asset/play_icon3.gif"},{image:"/asset/play_icon4.gif"},{image:"/asset/play_icon5.gif"}],selectedIcon:0};this.selectIcon=(e,index)=>{const{icons}=this.state;let getElem=document.getElementsByClassName("play_icons");icons.map((el,i)=>{if(i===index){getElem[i].childNodes[0].classList.add("Icon-awesome-check-circle");this.setState({selectedIcon:el.image});this.props.onChange(3,el.image);}else{getElem[i].childNodes[0].classList.remove("Icon-awesome-check-circle");}});};}render(){const{icons,selectedIcon}=this.state;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"video_icons_list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Video Play Icons"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:icons.map((icon,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:e=>this.selectIcon(e,index),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"play_icons","data-label":index,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{class:selectedIcon===index?"Icon-awesome-check-circle":"",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa fa-check-circle"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:getPath(icon.image)})]})},index);})})]});}}// Icon-awesome-check-circle
